00036 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_MODULO_H
00037 #define CONSTRAINT_MODULO_H
00038 
00039 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00040 struct NotModConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00041 {
00042     virtual string constraint_name()
00043   { return "NotModulo"; }
00044   
00045   VarRef1 var1;
00046   VarRef2 var2;
00047   VarRef3 var3;
00048 
00049   NotModConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) :
00050     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00051   {
00052   
00053       if(var1.getInitialMin() < 0 || var2.getInitialMin() < 1 ||
00054          var3.getInitialMin() < 0)
00055       { 
00056       FAIL_EXIT("The negated 'modulo' constraint only supports nonnegative numbers, and positive bases, at present.");
00057       }
00058   }
00059   
00060   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00061   {
00062     triggerCollection t;
00063     if(var1.isBound())
00064     {
00065         t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00066         t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00067     }
00068     else
00069     {
00070         t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), Assigned));
00071     }
00072     
00073     if(var2.isBound())
00074     {
00075         t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00076         t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 1), Assigned));
00081     }
00082     
00083     if(var3.isBound())
00084     {
00085         t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 1), LowerBound));
00086         t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00087     }
00088     else
00089     {
00090         t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 1), Assigned));
00091     }
00092     return t;
00093   }
00094   
00095   virtual void propagate(int flag, DomainDelta)
00096   {
00097     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Mod);
00098     // propagate var1 % var2 != var3 by forward checking
00099     if(var1.isAssigned() && var2.isAssigned())
00100     {
00101         if(!var3.isBound())
00102         {
00103             var3.removeFromDomain(var1.getAssignedValue() % var2.getAssignedValue());
00104         }
00105         else
00106         {
00107             DomainInt temp=var1.getAssignedValue() % var2.getAssignedValue();
00108             if(temp==var3.getMin())
00109                 var3.setMin(temp+1);
00110             else if(temp==var3.getMax())
00111                 var3.setMax(temp-1);
00112         }
00113     }
00114     else if(var1.isAssigned() && var3.isAssigned())
00115     {
00116         if(!var2.isBound())
00117         {
00118             for(DomainInt i=var2.getMin(); i<=var2.getMax(); i++)
00119             {
00120                 if(var1.getAssignedValue() % i == var3.getAssignedValue())
00121                 {
00122                     var2.removeFromDomain(i);
00123                 }
00124             }
00125         }
00126         else
00127         {
00128             if(var1.getAssignedValue() % var2.getMin() == var3.getAssignedValue())
00129             {
00130                 var2.setMin(var2.getMin()+1);
00131             }
00132             else if(var1.getAssignedValue() % var2.getMax() == var3.getAssignedValue())
00133             {
00134                 var2.setMax(var2.getMax()-1);
00135             }
00136         }
00137     }
00138     else if(var2.isAssigned() && var3.isAssigned())
00139     {
00140         if(!var1.isBound())
00141         {
00142             for(DomainInt i=var1.getMin(); i<=var1.getMax(); i++)
00143             {
00144                 if(i % var2.getAssignedValue() == var3.getAssignedValue())
00145                 {
00146                     var1.removeFromDomain(i);
00147                     
00148                     // skip a few iterations to the next interesting value.
00149                     i=i+var2.getAssignedValue()-1;
00150                 }
00151             }
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155             if(var1.getMin() % var2.getAssignedValue() == var3.getAssignedValue())
00156             {
00157                 var1.setMin(var1.getMin()+1);
00158             }
00159             else if(var1.getMax() % var2.getAssignedValue() == var3.getAssignedValue())
00160             {
00161                 var1.setMax(var1.getMax()-1);
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165     
00166   }
00167   
00168   virtual void full_propagate()
00169   { 
00170     propagate(1,0);
00171   }
00172   
00173   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00174   {
00175     D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00176     return v[0] % v[1] != v[2];
00177   }
00178   
00179   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00180   { 
00181     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00182     v.push_back(var1);
00183     v.push_back(var2);
00184     v.push_back(var3);
00185     return v;
00186   }
00187   
00188   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00189   {  
00190     for(DomainInt v1 = var1.getMin(); v1 <= var1.getMax(); ++v1)
00191     {
00192       if(var1.inDomain(v1))
00193       {
00194         for(DomainInt v2 = var2.getMin(); v2 <= var2.getMax(); ++v2)
00195         {
00196           if(var2.inDomain(v2))
00197           {
00198               if(var3.getMin()!= v1 % v2)
00199               {
00200                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, v1));
00201                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, v2));
00202                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, var3.getMin()));
00203                   return true;
00204               }
00205               if(var3.getMax()!= v1 % v2)
00206               {
00207                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, v1));
00208                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, v2));
00209                   assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, var3.getMax()));
00210                   return true;
00211               }
00212           }
00213         }
00214       }
00215     }
00216     return false;
00217   }
00218 };

00222 template<typename VarRef1, typename VarRef2, typename VarRef3>
00223 struct ModConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00224 {
00225   virtual string constraint_name()
00226   { return "Modulo"; }
00227   
00228   VarRef1 var1;
00229   VarRef2 var2;
00230   VarRef3 var3;
00231 
00232   ModConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, VarRef1 _var1, VarRef2 _var2, VarRef3 _var3) :
00233     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2), var3(_var3)
00234   {
00235   
00236       if(var1.getInitialMin() < 0 || var2.getInitialMin() < 1 ||
00237          var3.getInitialMin() < 0)
00238       { 
00239       FAIL_EXIT("The 'modulo' constraint only supports nonnegative numbers, and positive bases, at present.");
00240       }
00241   }
00242   
00243   virtual triggerCollection setup_internal()
00244   {
00245     triggerCollection t;
00246     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, -1), LowerBound));
00247     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, -2), LowerBound));
00248     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, -3), LowerBound));
00249     t.push_back(make_trigger(var1, Trigger(this, 1), UpperBound));
00250     t.push_back(make_trigger(var2, Trigger(this, 2), UpperBound));
00251     t.push_back(make_trigger(var3, Trigger(this, 3), UpperBound));
00252     return t;
00253   }
00254   
00255   virtual void propagate(int flag, DomainDelta)
00256   {
00257     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Mod);
00258     // aiming at bounds(D)-consistency. 
00259     // Not achieved because we don't trigger on the supporting values, only bounds.
00260     
00261     // var1 upperbound
00262     DomainInt var1val=var1.getMax();
00263     while(!testsupport_var1(var1val))
00264     {
00265         // While no support for upperbound, reduce upperbound
00266         var1.setMax(var1val-1);
00267         var1val=var1.getMax();
00268         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00269     }
00270     
00271     var1val=var1.getMin();
00272     while(!testsupport_var1(var1val))
00273     {
00274         var1.setMin(var1val+1);
00275         var1val=var1.getMin();
00276         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00277     }
00278     
00279     DomainInt var2val=var2.getMax();
00280     while(!testsupport_var2(var2val))
00281     {
00282         // While no support for upperbound, reduce upperbound
00283         var2.setMax(var2val-1);  // Is this the right function for pruning the upperbound?
00284         var2val=var2.getMax();
00285         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00286     }
00287     
00288     var2val=var2.getMin();
00289     while(!testsupport_var2(var2val))
00290     {
00291         var2.setMin(var2val+1);
00292         var2val=var2.getMin();
00293         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00294     }
00295     
00296     DomainInt var3val=var3.getMax();
00297     while(!testsupport_var3(var3val))
00298     {
00299         // While no support for upperbound, reduce upperbound
00300         var3.setMax(var3val-1);  // Is this the right function for pruning the upperbound?
00301         var3val=var3.getMax();
00302         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00303     }
00304     
00305     var3val=var3.getMin();
00306     while(!testsupport_var3(var3val))
00307     {
00308         var3.setMin(var3val+1);
00309         var3val=var3.getMin();
00310         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00311     }
00312     
00313   }
00314   
00315   // next step is to modify the following three functions to store the supporting tuple,
00316   // then watch the literals in that tuple. 
00317   
00318   inline BOOL testsupport_var1(DomainInt var1val)
00319   {
00320     // If this returns true var1val would be supported by
00321     // var2=var2.getMax , var3=var1val
00322     
00323     if(var2.getMax()>var1val && var3.inDomain(var1val))
00324     {
00325         return true;
00326     }
00327     for(DomainInt var2val=var2.getMin(); var2val<=var2.getMax() && var2val<=var1val; ++var2val)
00328     {
00329         if(var2.inDomain(var2val) && var3.inDomain(var1val % var2val))
00330         {
00331             return true;
00332         }
00333     }
00334     return false;
00335   }
00336   
00337   inline BOOL testsupport_var2(DomainInt var2val)
00338   {
00339       // var1 % var2 = var3
00340       for(DomainInt var1val=var1.getMin(); var1val<=var1.getMax(); ++var1val)
00341       {
00342           if(var1.inDomain(var1val) && var3.inDomain(var1val % var2val))
00343           {
00344               return true;
00345           }
00346       }
00347       return false;
00348   }
00349   
00350   inline BOOL testsupport_var3(DomainInt var3val)
00351   {
00352       // Iterate through var2 then
00353       // through the values of var1 which are congruent with var3val.
00354       DomainInt var2val=var2.getMin();
00355       
00356       if(var2val<=var3val) var2val=var3val+1;  // var3val<var2val always.
00357         for(; var2val<=var2.getMax(); ++var2val)
00358         {
00359             if(var2.inDomain(var2val))
00360             {
00361                 DomainInt var1val=var1.getMin();
00362                 // need to jump to the next value which is congruent with var3 (mod var2)
00363                 DomainInt mod=var1val%var2val;
00364                 if(mod<var3val)
00365                 {
00366                     var1val+=(var3val-mod);
00367                     //if((var1val%var2val) != var3val) {cerr << "What on earth?1" << endl;}
00368                 }
00369                 if(mod>var3val)
00370                 {
00371                     var1val+=(var3val-mod)+var2val;
00372                     //if((var1val%var2val) != var3val) {cerr << "What on earth?2" << endl;}
00373                 }
00374                 //if((var1val%var2val) != var3val) {cerr << var1val <<","<<var2val<<","<<var3val << endl;}
00375                 for(; var1val<=var1.getMax(); var1val+=var2val) 
00376                     // Skips values which are not congruent.
00377                 {
00378                     if(var1.inDomain(var1val) && (var1val % var2val)==var3val)
00379                     {
00380                         return true;
00381                     }
00382                 }
00383             }
00384         }
00385         return false;
00386   }
00387   
00388   virtual void full_propagate()
00389   { 
00390     propagate(1,0); 
00391     /*propagate(2,0);
00392     propagate(3,0);
00393     propagate(-1,0);
00394     propagate(-2,0);
00395     propagate(-3,0);*/
00396   }
00397   
00398   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00399   {
00400     D_ASSERT(v_size == 3);
00401     return v[0] % v[1] == v[2];
00402   }
00403   
00404   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00405   { 
00406     vector<AnyVarRef> v;
00407     v.push_back(var1);
00408     v.push_back(var2);
00409     v.push_back(var3);
00410     return v;
00411   }
00412   
00413   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00414   {  
00415     for(DomainInt v1 = var1.getMin(); v1 <= var1.getMax(); ++v1)
00416     {
00417       if(var1.inDomain(v1))
00418       {
00419         for(DomainInt v2 = var2.getMin(); v2 <= var2.getMax(); ++v2)
00420         {
00421           if(var2.inDomain(v2) && var3.inDomain(v1 % v2))
00422           {
00423             assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, v1));
00424             assignment.push_back(make_pair(1, v2));
00425             assignment.push_back(make_pair(2, v1 % v2));
00426             return true;
00427           }
00428         }
00429       }
00430     }
00431     return false;
00432   }
00433   
00434   // Function to make it reifiable in the most minimal way.
00435     virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00436     {
00437         return new NotModConstraint<VarRef1, VarRef2, VarRef3>(stateObj, var1, var2, var3);
00438     }
00439 };
00440 
00441 template<typename V1, typename V2>
00442 inline AbstractConstraint*
00443 BuildCT_MODULO(StateObj* stateObj, const V1& vars, const V2& var2, ConstraintBlob&)
00444 {
00445   D_ASSERT(vars.size() == 2);
00446   D_ASSERT(var2.size() == 1);
00447   return new ModConstraint<typename V1::value_type, typename V1::value_type,
00448                            typename V2::value_type>(stateObj, vars[0], vars[1], var2[0]);
00449 }
